author: Aborgh

changelog.release_notes: BIG UPDATE! You can now choose to add date, and the watchface has been rebuilt so more feature will more easily added. Users with pebble time will in the near future be able to choose their color of choice!

BIG UPDATE! You can now choose to add date, and the watchface has been rebuilt so more feature will more easily added. Users with pebble time will in the near future be able to choose their color of choice!

Pebble B/W Added configuration if you want to invert the watchface :) More cooming soon. Vibrates on bluetooth disconnect also. Pebble Time For you lucky pebble time owners, I have changed the colors so they are green and when bluetooth disconnects it turns blue. 

Fixed the irritating vibration pattern upon saving settings

2.0 
Pebble B/W
Added configuration if you want to invert the watchface :) More cooming soon. Vibrates on bluetooth disconnect also.
Pebble Time
For you lucky pebble time owners, I have changed the colors so they are green and when bluetooth disconnects it turns blue.

description:
A watchface that cuts off the lower part of hours and upper part of minutes to create a sleek cutoff effect. This is my first watchface so be nice :) 
It's for both pebble and pebble time. 

BIG UPDATE! You can now choose to add date, and the watchface has been rebuilt so more feature will more easily added. Users with pebble time will in the near future be able to choose their color of choice!

Big thanks to TurnerVink!

title: Cutoff
